description.raw:
The scripts to use for arenas testing which automatically start all logging mechanisms are inside test/ directory and only installed while at building time DRI capabilities are detected. This is preventing them from going into official packages.

I'm not sure if it would be a good idea to install them or keep for internal use just in the repo.
